short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Little Master Cricket! Bat your way to victory, hit boundaries and chase high scores in this fun cricket game!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Little Master Cricket, developed by Bennett Foddy, is a fun and challenging sports game that teaches players the basics of cricket batting through a unique control system. The gameâ€™s ragdoll physics engine delivers a realistic and immersive batting experience. Players aim to hit the ball into a striped scoring zone, choosing between powerful swings to quickly score a hundred runs or a more defensive approach to avoid getting out. However, players must be careful to avoid hitting into the yellow and black zones to stay in the game.

If you have any questions about our Little Master Cricket game extension or just want to give us some feedback, feel free to send us a message or write a review! We'd love to hear from you. You can mouse over to Support tab on the extension, then click on "visit the developer's support site" to contact us.

If you wish to remove this extension, follow this steps:
1. Click the 3-dot icon at the top-right corner of your screen.
2. Hover your mouse on More tools then click Extensions.
3. Find the Little Master Cricket extension.
4. Press "Remove"
